sentences.sContent: the most authoritative work on English surnames
sentences.sCn: 有关英语姓氏的最权威著作

sentences.sContent: ...the authors provide the most authoritative volume to date that describes--and more importantly predicts--how the Internet will shape our lives in the coming decades...

synos.tran: 有权威的；命令式的；当局的

words.tran: 权威地；命令式地；可信地

trans.tranOther: an authoritative book, account etc is respected because the person who wrote it knows a lot about the subject
